Sussex also created a new record for the team.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/former-indian-cricketer-rp-singhs-son-harry-hits-maiden-fifty-in-county-one-day-cup-watch/articleshow/123335015.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/former-indian-cricketer-rp-singhs-son-harry-hits-maiden-fifty-in-county-one-day-cup-watch/articleshow/123335015.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 19:54:31 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="32860" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123335260,imgsize-32860.cms"/></item><item><title>Jamie Dimon warned of a tech arms race with China</title><description><![CDATA[The Nvidia H20 chip sales to China are under scrutiny. Australia's recent T20I form, including series wins against multiple teams, positions them as a formidable force.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/aus-vs-sa-3rd-t20i-big-show-glenn-maxwell-roars-in-cairns-as-australia-clinch-last-over-thriller-to-seal-series-2-1-vs-south-africa/articleshow/123334664.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/aus-vs-sa-3rd-t20i-big-show-glenn-maxwell-roars-in-cairns-as-australia-clinch-last-over-thriller-to-seal-series-2-1-vs-south-africa/articleshow/123334664.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 18:52:17 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="16918" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123334702,imgsize-16918.cms"/></item><item><title>‘16 days, 23 districts’: Rahul Gandhi launches 'Vote Adhikar Yatra' in Bihar</title><description><![CDATA[Rahul Gandhi launched the "Vote Adhikar Yatra" in Bihar, protesting alleged voter roll manipulation by the Election Commission ahead of state elections. The 16-day yatra, supported by Mahagathbandhan allies, aims to raise awareness and protect voting rights. Tejashwi Yadav emphasized ensuring no voter is excluded, while Gandhi accuses the EC of collusion with the BJP, a claim the EC denies.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/16-days-23-districts-rahul-gandhi-launches-vote-adhikar-yatra-in-bihar-india-allies-to-join/articleshow/123334457.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/16-days-23-districts-rahul-gandhi-launches-vote-adhikar-yatra-in-bihar-india-allies-to-join/articleshow/123334457.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 18:20:33 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="734952" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123334451,imgsize-734952.cms"/></item><item><title>'Two or three weeks': Trump on slapping China with Russian oil tariff</title><description><![CDATA[US President Donald Trump has indicated potential retaliatory tariffs on China for its Russian oil purchases, following similar actions against India. BJP accused Congress of avoiding inconvenient history. NCERT stated Congress accepted Partition plans. They underestimated Jinnah.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/set-this-book-on-fire-congress-slams-ncert-partition-module-bjp-hits-back/articleshow/123334012.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/set-this-book-on-fire-congress-slams-ncert-partition-module-bjp-hits-back/articleshow/123334012.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 17:30:45 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1046351" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123334008,imgsize-1046351.cms"/></item><item><title>'Frustrating, but ...': Karun Nair on England tour; lauds Gill, Gambhir for clarity</title><description><![CDATA[India batter Karun Nair reflected on a bittersweet Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy series in England, acknowledging his frustration at not converting starts into big scores despite batting well. You can choose to stop, or you can choose to learn forever.”]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/education-is-not-an-event-you-can-learn-forever-says-perplexity-ceo-aravind-srinivas-lessons-every-student-can-learn-from-him/articleshow/123334460.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/education-is-not-an-event-you-can-learn-forever-says-perplexity-ceo-aravind-srinivas-lessons-every-student-can-learn-from-him/articleshow/123334460.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 18:26:21 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI Education</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="37896" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123334468,imgsize-37896.cms"/></item><item><title>Asia Cup: Former batter shocks by leaving Gill out of playing XI; check full team</title><description><![CDATA[Mohammad Kaif has unveiled his predicted India squad for the Asia Cup 2025, sparking debate by including Shubman Gill in the 15-member team but excluding him from the playing XI. Visa data suggests so</title><description><![CDATA[Indian mobility to the UK is witnessing a steep decline, with Home Office data showing work visas for Indians halved to 81,463 in 2024 and student visas dropping 42% from the previous year. Policy shifts, including salary hikes and restrictions on dependants, are reshaping choices, pushing Indian students and professionals to reconsider Britain as a destination.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/study-abroad/after-the-us-is-the-uk-also-losing-its-appeal-for-indian-students-and-professionals-the-visa-data-suggests-so/articleshow/123333381.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/study-abroad/after-the-us-is-the-uk-also-losing-its-appeal-for-indian-students-and-professionals-the-visa-data-suggests-so/articleshow/123333381.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 16:40:51 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TRISHA TEWARI</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="2063798" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123333362,imgsize-2063798.cms"/></item><item><title>Straight to peace deal? Trump to meet Zelenskyy; will talk to Putin 'if all works out'</title><description><![CDATA[Following a meeting in Alaska, President Trump announced his preference for a direct peace agreement to end the Russia-Ukraine war, rather than a ceasefire. Zelenskyy is scheduled to visit Washington D.C. on Monday, with a potential meeting with Putin to follow if discussions progress positively. Both leaders have expressed openness to negotiations, signaling a potential path toward resolving the conflict.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/ukraine-russia-war-no-ceasefire-straight-to-peace-deal-donald-trump-sets-lofty-goal-to-meet-zelenskyy-may-talk-to-putin-again-if-all-works-out/articleshow/123332189.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/ukraine-russia-war-no-ceasefire-straight-to-peace-deal-donald-trump-sets-lofty-goal-to-meet-zelenskyy-may-talk-to-putin-again-if-all-works-out/articleshow/123332189.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 14:59:39 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="59444" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123332241,imgsize-59444.cms"/></item><item><title>Serious Injury Replacement: BCCI introduces new rule after Pant's injury</title><description><![CDATA[The BCCI has introduced a "Serious Injury Replacement" rule for multi-day domestic cricket starting in the 2025-26 season, prompted by injuries in the recent India-England series. This allows teams to replace players injured by external blows, like fractures, with like-for-like substitutes approved by the match referee. While welcomed by some, like India's coach Gautam Gambhir, the rule has faced criticism.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/serious-injury-replacement-bcci-introduces-new-rule-after-rishabh-pants-injury-in-andersontendulkar-trophy/articleshow/123333180.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/serious-injury-replacement-bcci-introduces-new-rule-after-rishabh-pants-injury-in-andersontendulkar-trophy/articleshow/123333180.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 16:26:06 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="83376" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123333224,imgsize-83376.cms"/></item><item><title>Mission Sudarshan Chakra: Multi-layered air & missile shield with offensive weapons</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/mission-sudarshan-chakra-multi-layered-air-missile-shield-integrated-with-offensive-weapons/articleshow/123328590.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/mission-sudarshan-chakra-multi-layered-air-missile-shield-integrated-with-offensive-weapons/articleshow/123328590.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 08:54:15 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>RAJAT PANDIT</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="566291" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123328621,imgsize-566291.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: Ouch! Brevis's 53 off 26 balls propelled South Africa to a competitive total, providing entertainment both on and off the field.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/watch-ouch-fan-crashes-into-the-fence-while-trying-to-catch-a-massive-dewald-brevis-six-during-aus-vs-sa-3rd-t20i/articleshow/123333586.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/watch-ouch-fan-crashes-into-the-fence-while-trying-to-catch-a-massive-dewald-brevis-six-during-aus-vs-sa-3rd-t20i/articleshow/123333586.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 17:29:42 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="44936" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123333999,imgsize-44936.cms"/></item><item><title>Arjun follows in parents Sachin-Anjali's footsteps after engagement with Saaniya</title><description><![CDATA[Arjun Tendulkar, son of Sachin Tendulkar, is engaged to Sanniya Chandhok on August 13, 2025. The couple's age difference mirrors Sachin's marriage to Anjali, who was older than him. Arjun, a cricketer, follows in his father's footsteps both on and off the field, embracing a relationship that defies societal norms, much like his father did.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/arjun-tendulkar-follows-in-parents-sachin-anjalis-footsteps-following-engagement-with-saaniya-chandhok/articleshow/123333239.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/arjun-tendulkar-follows-in-parents-sachin-anjalis-footsteps-following-engagement-with-saaniya-chandhok/articleshow/123333239.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 16:32:59 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="63246" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123333298,imgsize-63246.cms"/></item><item><title>Ukraine-Russia war: EU leaders back Zelenskyy’s right to choose alliances</title><description><![CDATA[European leaders affirmed that Russia cannot dictate Ukraine's alliances. This came after talks between Donald Trump and Vladimir Putin failed to end the Ukraine war. Europe pledged to support Ukraine's right to choose its future. Trump aimed for a deal, but key issues remained unresolved. Putin welcomed the talks and called for cooperation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/ukraine-russia-war-eu-leaders-back-zelenskyys-right-to-choose-alliances-push-for-continued-sanctions-on-moscow/articleshow/123332838.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/ukraine-russia-war-eu-leaders-back-zelenskyys-right-to-choose-alliances-push-for-continued-sanctions-on-moscow/articleshow/123332838.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 16:10:19 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="820896" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123333025,imgsize-820896.cms"/></item><item><title>Talks on border issue: Chinese FM Wang Yi to visit India next week</title><description><![CDATA["At the invitation of national security advisor Shri Ajit Doval, Member of the Politburo of the Communist Party of China and Chinese foreign minister Wang Yi will visit India on 18-19 August 2025," the MEA stated in a release.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/talks-on-border-issue-chinese-fm-wang-yi-to-visit-india-next-week-eam-jaishankar-to-hold-bilateral-talks/articleshow/123332152.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/talks-on-border-issue-chinese-fm-wang-yi-to-visit-india-next-week-eam-jaishankar-to-hold-bilateral-talks/articleshow/123332152.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 14:55:41 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="798976" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123332214,imgsize-798976.cms"/></item><item><title>'10/10' Alaska meeting: Inconclusive Trump-Putin talks leave India in limbo; here's how</title><description><![CDATA[The Alaska meeting between Trump and Putin concluded without a clear agreement, despite Trump's positive assessment. Putin emphasized addressing Russia's concerns, including Nato expansion, before any peace deal. Trump hinted at potential secondary tariffs on India for Russian oil purchases but deferred immediate action, leaving New Delhi uncertain about its trade relations.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/inconclusive-trump-putin-talks-leaves-india-in-limbo/articleshow/123329991.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/inconclusive-trump-putin-talks-leaves-india-in-limbo/articleshow/123329991.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 11:54:17 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>CHIDANAND RAJGHATTA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="901845" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123330316,imgsize-901845.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Some people came...’: ‘The Bengal Files’ trailer launch disrupted</title><description><![CDATA[A controversy erupted in Kolkata during the trailer release of ‘The Bengal Files.’ Actress Pallavi Joshi alleged disruption, questioning freedom of expression in West Bengal and comparing the situation unfavorably to Kashmir. Director Vivek Agnihotri condemned the incident as dictatorship, citing disrupted event arrangements.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/kolkata/some-people-came-and-cut-all-wires-the-bengal-files-trailer-launch-disrupted-in-kolkata-director-vivek-agnihotri-cites-failure-of-law-and-order-in-west-bengal/articleshow/123331842.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/kolkata/some-people-came-and-cut-all-wires-the-bengal-files-trailer-launch-disrupted-in-kolkata-director-vivek-agnihotri-cites-failure-of-law-and-order-in-west-bengal/articleshow/123331842.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 14:38:28 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="16532" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123332063,imgsize-16532.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: Dewald Brevis smashes hat-trick of no-look sixes; fan jumps fence to catch ball</title><description><![CDATA[Dewald Brevis stunned spectators in the third T20I against Australia with an explosive innings. The South African batsman showcased his power-hitting ability, highlighted by three consecutive no-look sixes off Aaron Hardie. Brevis's audacious display sent the crowd into a frenzy, with one fan even attempting to retrieve a ball by jumping over the fence.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/watch-dewald-brevis-smashes-hat-trick-of-no-look-sixes-fan-jumps-fence-to-catch-ball/articleshow/123333011.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/watch-dewald-brevis-smashes-hat-trick-of-no-look-sixes-fan-jumps-fence-to-catch-ball/articleshow/123333011.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 16:24:52 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="116812" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123333153,imgsize-116812.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Helmet too big’: Pretorius leaves fans in splits during 3rd T20I - Watch</title><description><![CDATA[During a recent T20I match between Australia and South Africa, Proteas batter Lhuan-dre Pretorius provided a comical interlude. While facing Josh Hazlewood, his helmet slipped, obscuring his vision as he ran between wickets. Despite the laughter, Pretorius showcased his talent with a rapid 24 off 15 balls, including five boundaries.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/helmet-too-big-lhuan-dre-pretorius-leaves-fans-in-splits-during-aus-vs-sa-3rd-t20i-watch/articleshow/123332561.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/helmet-too-big-lhuan-dre-pretorius-leaves-fans-in-splits-during-aus-vs-sa-3rd-t20i-watch/articleshow/123332561.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 16:15:49 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="37554" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123333119,imgsize-37554.cms"/></item><item><title>ICC U19 World Cup 2026: Full line-up confirmed, USA seal final spot</title><description><![CDATA[The USA secured the final spot in the ICC U19 Men’s Cricket World Cup 2026, joining 15 other teams in Zimbabwe and Namibia. They dominated the Americas Qualifier, led by Arjun Mahesh, while Tanzania, Afghanistan, Japan, and Scotland also qualified through regional tournaments. The event promises to showcase future stars, blending traditional powerhouses with emerging talents.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/cricket-icc-u19-world-cup-2026-full-line-up-confirmed-usa-seal-final-spot/articleshow/123332647.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/cricket-icc-u19-world-cup-2026-full-line-up-confirmed-usa-seal-final-spot/articleshow/123332647.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 15:46:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="12100" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123332750,imgsize-12100.cms"/></item><item><title>How Goa managed to tame rabies: Inside state's drive that vaccinated 63k dogs in 30 days</title><description><![CDATA[Goa achieved a "rabies-controlled" status in 2021 after eliminating human rabies cases since 2017, following a 2014 outbreak that claimed 17 lives. Mission Rabies initiated mass vaccination and sterilization drives, significantly reducing cases. Cross-border transmission from neighboring states remains a challenge, prompting intensified vaccination efforts in border regions and mandatory pet vaccination declarations for visitors.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/goa/how-goa-managed-to-tame-rabies-inside-states-drive-that-vaccinated-63000-dogs-in-30-days/articleshow/123328961.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/goa/how-goa-managed-to-tame-rabies-inside-states-drive-that-vaccinated-63000-dogs-in-30-days/articleshow/123328961.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 09:39:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>NIDA SAYED</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="490849" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123328970,imgsize-490849.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Finally woken up’: Cong demands discussion on GST 2.0 announced by PM</title><description><![CDATA[Following PM Modi's GST reform announcement, Congress demands a discussion paper, advocating for a simplified tax structure. Jairam Ramesh suggests rate reductions and extending the GST compensation cess to aid states. PM Modi plans GST revisions around Diwali, promising relief to consumers and small businesses by reducing tax rates on essential goods.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/finally-woken-up-congress-demands-discussion-paper-on-gst-2-0-announced-by-pm-modi-insists-on-simplification-protection-for-states/articleshow/123330772.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/finally-woken-up-congress-demands-discussion-paper-on-gst-2-0-announced-by-pm-modi-insists-on-simplification-protection-for-states/articleshow/123330772.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 14:18:40 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="461247" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123331869,imgsize-461247.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Russia lost an oil client, which is India’: What Trump said before meeting Putin</title><description><![CDATA[US President Trump imposed a 25% tariff on India for its Russian crude oil trade, claiming it cost Russia a major client. Trump's remarks came after his recent decision to implement a 50% tariff on India’s exports to the US, citing India's oil trade with Russia as the reason.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/russia-lost-an-oil-client-which-is-india-what-donald-trump-said-before-meet-with-putin-secondary-sanctions-would-be-devastating/articleshow/123329127.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/russia-lost-an-oil-client-which-is-india-what-donald-trump-said-before-meet-with-putin-secondary-sanctions-would-be-devastating/articleshow/123329127.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 10:11:29 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="65262" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123329144,imgsize-65262.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <title><![CDATA[India-China direct flights resumption likely to boost trade, tourism and economic ties]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/aviation/india-china-flights-resumption-economic-ties-impact-19653647.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[India and China are set to resume direct passenger flights after five years, a move expected to boost trade, tourism, and economic ties. The resumption comes amid growing diplomatic engagement, recent trade approvals, and ahead of Prime Minister Modi’s visit to China for the SCO Summit. Pre-pandemic, over 8 lakh passengers traveled annually between the two countries, with cargo flows also significant. Restoring direct flights is likely to reignite strong demand, supporting business, tourism, and people-to-people exchanges.]]></description>

      <description><![CDATA[As part of the deal, Infosys will acquire 75% of the shareholding in Versent Group, a wholly owned subsidiary of Telstra and a leading digital transformation solutions provider in Australia.       <title><![CDATA[Need a functional IBC framework, not court-dependent solutions, say experts]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/economy/india-ibc-reforms-functional-framework-courts-experts-19653521.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Experts say proposed changes to the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code will only work if backed by a functional framework, not left to court-driven resolutions. While the bill aims to speed up timelines, enable out-of-court settlements, and give lenders a bigger role, SC Garg and Kumar Saurabh Singh warn that effective implementation will be key to avoiding delays and misuse.]]></description>

      <description><![CDATA[Dashverse, an AI-driven entertainment startup, is set to invest 60-70% of its recent $13 million Series A funding into advanced AI research and development. With its microdrama app Dashreels surpassing 5 million downloads in just a month and ranking third on the Google Play Store, the company aims to build India’s leading AI creator ecosystem.
